JUnit source is released under the CPL.  The FAQ and source forge differ on=

the licensing version though...

- http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/fa=
q.htm#overview_7  -- says version
0.5
- http://sourceforge.net/projects/jun=
it/develop -- says version 1.0

The CPL is described here --
http://www.ibm=
.com/developerworks/library/os-cplfaq.html

Personally I think this informa=
tion should appear in the source code files,
not the whole license, but som=
e sort of copyright.  But maybe that is not
the author's intent.

If you'd =
like to develop with/on the code you can obtain the latest source
from http=
://github.com/KentBeck/junit.

Hope I helped,

Big Mike

P.S. There is more=
 information on the FAQ --
http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm
